name: add section | s
description: Command to generate a section of the documentation in Urxnium Doc.

exampleCodes.title: Command
exampleCodes.description: This command generates a new section file in the Urxnium Doc documentation. These sections will be displayed as a section title in the documentation.
exampleCodes.out: ? what is the section name ? [type your section name]

exampleCodes.title: Structure resulting
exampleCodes.description: At the end of this command, it results in a file within the following structure

exampleCodes.title: Resulting file
exampleCodes.description: At the end of this command it will result in a file like the following

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: It is the name that the section will have

attributes.name: elements
attributes.description: This field should not be edited, the route is generated through the CLI
